name: reshelve
description: A MERN Google Books API application that uses GraphQL API and Apollo Server after being refactored from RESTful APIs.

scripts.cleanall: npm ci && concurrently "npm run clean --prefix client" "npm run clean --prefix server"
scripts.start: npm run client:build && npm run server
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
